law.catch_line: Local governments authorized to adopt provisions of the Uniform Residential Landlord and Tenant Act in their entirety and without amendment.
law.text: The General Assembly hereby authorizes cities, counties and urban-county governments to enact the provisions of the Uniform Residential Landlord and Tenant Act as set forth in KRS 383.505 to 383.705. If adopted, these provisions shall be adopted in their entirety and without amendment. No other ordinance shall be enacted by a city, county or urban-county government which relates to the subjects embraced in KRS 383.505 to 383.705.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984.
